results.title: A Summer's tale = Conte d'ete
results.creator_credit: Eric Rohmer, Margaret Menegoz, Canal+, La Sept Cinema, Les Films du Losange and Sofilmka
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Tales of the four seasons = Contes des quatre saisons”.
Gaspard (Melvil Poupard), a musically inclined maths graduate with time to kill is waiting for his girlfriend, Lena, in the resort town of Dinard, unbeknownst that his stable and uneventful life is about to be turned on it head when he becomes torn between his affections for three women. He whiles away the lazy afternoon hours with Margot (Amanda Langlet), a part time student and pancake house worker, and most importantly - a good listener. Margot wants a purely platonic relationship with Gaspard as she already has a boyfriend. Enter likely candidate number three, Margot’s friend Solene (Gwenaelle Simon), whom Gaspard becomes instantly smitten with and agrees to spend a weekend with on the island of Ouessant. When Lena finally arrives on the island Gaspard must finally make a choice between three women who are all offering him something different in the relationship stakes. In French with English subtitles. This film, the third in Rohmer’s “4 Season cycle” finds the director in fine story telling form.

results.title: Tombstone
results.creator_credit: George Pan Cosmatos, et al, Sean Daniel and Buena Vista
results.brief_description: A high-energy action adventure based on legend rather than historical finds facts Wyatt Earp (Kurt Russell) desiring to retire from law enforcement. With brothers Virgil (Sam Elliot) and Morgan (Bill Paxton), he arrives in Tombstone, Arizona intending to build his fortune. He discovers long-time friend Doc Holliday (Val Kilmer) is there and that the town is run by a group of brutal outlaws called the Cowboys. Earp, frustrated with his laudanum-addicted wife, begins a romance with the travelling stage actress Josephine Marcus (Dana Delaney). Meanwhile, the Cowboys terrorise the citizens of Tombstone unchecked. The stage is set for the ultimate Wild West showdown - a gunfight at the OK Corral.

results.title: Running and mobility (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Brian Hannant, Bruce Moir, Nicholas Cockram, Slater Sound Studios and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Conditioning for Sport”.
Gives an insight into the specific exercises, training and conditioning techniques necessary for proficiency in running. Describes how the body adjusts to new levels of achievement with the proper training.

results.title: The Silence = Tystnaden
results.creator_credit: Ingmar Bergman, Allan Ekelund and Svensk Filmindustri
results.brief_description: Ingmar Bergman’s ‘The Silence’ completes the director’s trilogy on faith which he commenced with ‘Through a glass darkly’(1961) and ‘Winter light’(1963). Once again Bergman explores themes surrounding the crisis of faith and the meaningless and isolation of human existence in a world where there is no god. His long time collaborator, cinematographer Sven Nykvist uses the black and white palette to create a world of harsh, unforgiving light and dark subterranean spaces. While on holiday Anna (Gunnel Lindblom), her ten year old son Johan (Jorgen Lindstrom) and her dying sister Ester (Ingrid Thulin) stop at a desolate grand hotel in an unnamed European city. Whilst there the sisters intense psychological bond begins to unravel when Anna picks up a man and brings him back to the hotel. In Swedish with English subtitles. Cast also includes Hakan Jahnberg. (Awards: Winner 1964 Guldbagge Award Best Film, Best Actress Ingrid Thulin, Best Director, Ingmar Bergman)

results.title: Money = L'Argent
results.creator_credit: Robert Bresson, Jean-Marc Henchoz and Marion's Films
results.brief_description: Robert Bresson’s adaptation of Leo Tolstoy’s “The forged note” is a bleak tale of a minor transgression which spirals out of control, releasing an avalanche of broken lives and murder. Told in the director’s usual minimalist style, ‘L’Argent’ (Money) traces the path of destruction a forged bank note leaves when two upper class school boys try to pass it off onto an unsuspecting photography shop. The shop owner then knowingly hands it over to a delivery driver who is arrested for carrying the counterfeit money. As a consequence the delivery driver’s life descends into a series of tragic misfortunes which lead from petty theft to cold blooded murder, while the privileged school boys and shop keeper remain untarnished. In French with English subtitles. Cast includes Christian Patey, Vincent Risterucci, Caroline Lang, Sylvie Van Den Elsen, Marc-Ernest Fourneau, Andre Cler and Bruno Lapeyre. (Awards: 1983 Cannes Film Festival-Best Director Robert Bresson, 1984 National Society of Film Critics Awards USA- Best Director Robert Bresson)

results.title: Grim reaper = La Commare Secca
results.creator_credit: Bernardo Bertolucci, Antonio Cervi and Pier Pasolini
results.brief_description: Screenwriter Pier Paolo Pasolini’s tragic story delves into the underbelly of lowlife brute povery to create a fascinating tapestry of human behaviour. A prostitute is brutally killed in a Rome park, while offscreen police investigators interrogate as variety of male suspects, the events depicted on screen display their alibies from each individual perspective, however their narrations do not necessarily match their actions. In Italian with English subtitles.

results.title: Johnny Guitar
results.creator_credit: Nicholas Ray, Herbert J. Yates and Republic Entertainment International
results.brief_description: A reformed gunfighter returns to a woman he had abandoned years earlier. She is now the proprietor of a gambling saloon opened in anticipation of the arrival of the railroad and in the face of hostile opposition from the local townspeople. The film’s bizarre, even baroque, intensity derives in part from the central antagonism between two women (virtually unique in the western), and in Yordan and Ray’s expressed intention of seeking an anti-McCarthy parable.

results.title: Aguirre: wrath of God
results.creator_credit: Werner Herzog and Werner Herzog Filmproduktion
results.brief_description: A stunning and gruelling adventure about a band of Spanish conquistadors led by Aguirre, and their descent into the heart of darkness while exploring the Amazon in search of El Dorado, the legendary city of Gold. As the expedition moves further into the jungle, they leave reality behind and enter a dreamlike, otherwordly land of delusion and madness. In German with English subtitles. Cast includes Klaus Kinski, Cecilia Rivera, Ruy Guerra, Helena Rojo, Del Negro and Daniel Zacapa. In German with English subtitles.

results.title: Beyond a reasonable doubt
results.creator_credit: Fritz Lang, Bert Friedlob and RKO Radio Pictures
results.brief_description: Guilty beyond a reasonable doubt - such is the incontrovertible law which pardons the innocent and condemns the guilty. But just how fallible is the process of law? To what extent can deceit, prejudice - and the cruel powers of fate - intervene to set a murderer free, or send an innocent man to the electric chair? Dana Andrews plays Tom Carret, a writer who becomes obsessed with the idea of proving that it is possible for a completely innocent man to be found guilty of murder. And when a pretty showgirl is found strangled in a ravine, and no killer can be found, the perfect opportunity presents itself. This dark and chilling drama is the last film Lang made in Hollywood.

results.title: After hours
results.creator_credit: Martin Scorsese, Amy Robinson, Griffin Dunne, Robert F. Colesberry and The Geffen Company
results.brief_description: Computer expert Paul Hackett accidentally stumbles into an all-night adventure through the rain-soaked streets of SoHo, Manhattan, when a chance evening encounter with a beautiful girl goes wrong. It all begins when his money flies out of a taxi and gets progressively worse from there, as he is led through a nightmarish chain of events. Eventually, his troubles become so horrible and convoluted that it seems he has wandered into a secret antechamber of Hell. All he wants is to get home, but events conspire against him in an hilariously appalling fashion. This nerve-wracking, blackly comic, paranoid nightmare is among Scorsese’s most entertaining and overlooked films. Cast includes Griffin Dunne, Rosanna Arquette, Verna Bloom, Teri Garr, John Heard, Cheech & Chong and a special appearance by Martin Scorsese.
